text: Sandy McVea was an Aboriginal Australian boxer and actor. He was associated with the boxer Snowy Baker. McVea featured in the 1918 silent film The Enemy Within playing an Aboriginal detective. He died of tuberculosis in the Broken Hill Hospital in February 1923. ==References== ==External links== *McVea in The Enemy Within at Australian Screen Online Category:1923 deaths Category:Indigenous Australian actors Category:Indigenous Australian boxers Category:Australian male boxers
title: Sandy McVea
